entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
